name: Houston, we have a gun!
description:
"game.love" build requires Löve2D runtime: https://love2d.org/
Mac build is broken untested, if someone has a mac, please comment if it works. If it doesn't please download "game.love" instead
If you know how to package Löve2D games for Mac, please leave a comment!

Web-Version is limited and somewhat buggy! If you can, please play the download version (it has high-scores!) 

Game design & Art by powertomato https://twitter.com/powertomato
Music & Sound by Stephan Kutscher http://www.stephankutscher.com
